traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The acolyte is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The acolyte has following cleric spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy * 1st level (3 slots): bless, cure wounds, sanctuary

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.
